plot: Clarkson, Hammond and May travel across the Middle East in a £3500 sports car to reach Jerusalem, and encounter all the political minefields (and the real ones) the Three Wise Men didn't.

The boys were given 3500 pounds each to buy cars that cost less than 3500 pounds and must be a convertible sports car. The result is Jeremy buys a Mazda MX-5, Richard purchases a Fiat Barchetta and James a BMW Z3. Once they have purchase their cars, they travel to the Middle East to follow the path of the Three Wise Men from Northern Iraq to Bethlehem, Palestine.—Caboose
